DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of unique participant instances associated with a systematic investigation into a subject.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:The single one of its kind._A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Concepts.definition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

Property.preferredDefinition: The single one of its kind._A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

Concepts.definition: The single one of its kind.
A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2/20/24 AI released per SME/Amanda Bell approval.ls5/17/23 changed origin to CDS. BF; 12/28/22 per 12/1/22 CDS call, upd property to reflect number of unique participants, not cases. jk 11/5/22 created for CDS data element. jk

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.administrativeNotes: 9/25/23: Released  melanoma  AI per 3Q23 metric report review. LS

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDS Coding Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please use natural numbers; do not use abbreviations or units (e.g. avoid using "1k" or "one thousand")
